body_html:
Hi @deepali-c , Thanks for the response!

-DBLAS="MKL" seems does not change the compilation.

I add this option in the caffe2 build instruction:

diff --git a/tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh b/tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh
index 37d816775..65e639359 100755
--- a/tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh
+++ b/tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh
@@ -300,6 +300,7 @@ function build_caffe2() {
                       -DCUDNN_INCLUDE_DIR=$CUDNN_INCLUDE_DIR \
                       -DCUDNN_LIB_DIR=$CUDNN_LIB_DIR \
                       -DCUDNN_LIBRARY=$CUDNN_LIBRARY \
+                      -DBLAS="MKL" \
                       -DUSE_MKLDNN=$USE_MKLDNN \
                       -DMKLDNN_INCLUDE_DIR=$MKLDNN_INCLUDE_DIR \
                       -DMKLDNN_LIB_DIR=$MKLDNN_LIB_DIR \

body:
Hi @deepali-c , Thanks for the response!

```-DBLAS="MKL"``` seems does not change the compilation.

I add this option in the caffe2 build instruction:
```bash
diff --git a/tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh b/tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh
index 37d816775..65e639359 100755
--- a/tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh
+++ b/tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh
@@ -300,6 +300,7 @@ function build_caffe2() {
                       -DCUDNN_INCLUDE_DIR=$CUDNN_INCLUDE_DIR \
                       -DCUDNN_LIB_DIR=$CUDNN_LIB_DIR \
                       -DCUDNN_LIBRARY=$CUDNN_LIBRARY \
+                      -DBLAS="MKL" \
                       -DUSE_MKLDNN=$USE_MKLDNN \
                       -DMKLDNN_INCLUDE_DIR=$MKLDNN_INCLUDE_DIR \
                       -DMKLDNN_LIB_DIR=$MKLDNN_LIB_DIR \
```
